title: Top Performer in Global Equity Markets
description: In 2022, Turkey's S&P Global Equity Indices saw an impressive annual growth of 105.78%, marking it as one of the highest increases globally.

title: Significant Decline in Financial Inflows
description: In 2023, Turkey experienced a net financial outflow of $707.83 million, indicating a substantial decrease in foreign investments.

title: Major Reduction in Inventory Levels
description: Turkey's inventory levels dropped by $21.16 billion in 2023, highlighting a significant reduction in stockpiles.
